sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer" class="py-2">
    <v-list class="text-start" :lines="false" nav>
      <v-list-subheader>PAGES</v-list-subheader>
      <v-divider></v-divider>
      <v-list-item
        v-for="item in navigationDrawerItems"
        :key="item.url"
        :title="item.title"
        :to="item.url"
        color="primary"
      >
        <template v-slot:prepend>
          <v-icon :icon="item.icon"></v-icon>
        </template>
      </v-list-item>
      <v-list-subheader>SETTINGS</v-list-subheader>
    </v-list>
    <v-expansion-panels class="px-2">
      <v-expansion-panel>
        <v-expansion-panel-title>Users</v-expansion-panel-title>
        <v-expansion-panel-text>
          <v-list :lines="false" nav class="text-start">
            <v-list-item
              v-for="user in users"
              :key="user.name"
              :title="user.name"
              :to="user.url"
            >
              <template v-slot:prepend>
                <v-icon icon="mdi-account-circle" color="info"></v-icon>
              </template>
              <template v-slot:append>
                <v-icon icon="mdi-chevron-right"></v-icon>
              </template>
            </v-list-item>
          </v-list>
        </v-expansion-panel-text>
      </v-expansion-panel>
    </v-expansion-panels>
    <v-btn
      :icon="darkMode ? 'mdi-weather-night' : 'mdi-white-balance-sunny'"
      @click="changeTheme"
    ></v-btn>
  </v-navigation-drawer>
</template>
<script>
import { useTheme } from "vuetify";

export default {
  name: "NavigationComponent",
  data() {
    return {
      drawer: false,
      theme: useTheme(),
      darkMode: false,
      navigationDrawerItems: [
        { title: "Home", url: "/", icon: "mdi-home-outline" },
        { title: "Settings", url: "settings", icon: "mdi-cog-outline" },
        { title: "Register", url: "register", icon: "mdi-account-plus" },
        { title: "Login", url: "login", icon: "mdi-login" },
        { title: "About", url: "about", icon: "mdi-information-outline" },
      ],
      users: [
        { name: "Mike", url: "/" },
        { name: "Sandy", url: "/" },
        { name: "Liam", url: "/" },
        { name: "Herman", url: "/" },
        { name: "John", url: "/" },
      ],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    openNavbar() {
      this.drawer = !this.drawer;
    },
    changeTheme() {
      this.darkMode = !this.darkMode;
      this.theme.global.name = this.darkMode ? "darkMode" : "lightMode";
    },
  },
};
</script>
